reasoning: The extension is a classic search hijacker disguised as a legitimate AI tool (Gemini/ChatGPT companion). While it does provide the AI interface in a side panel, it also injects a floating icon and a custom search bar onto every website the user visits (via all.js). User input in this injected search bar is redirected to 'srch.ing', a third-party domain used to monetize traffic. Furthermore, welcome.js silently loads a tracking pixel/iframe from 'eurekaa.app'. The use of Gemini branding is a lure to get users to install a tool that monitors browsing and hijacks search intent.

full_validation.reasoning: The extension is a classic search hijacker disguised as a legitimate AI tool (Gemini/ChatGPT companion). While it does provide the AI interface in a side panel, it also injects a floating icon and a custom search bar onto every website the user visits (via all.js). User input in this injected search bar is redirected to 'srch.ing', a third-party domain used to monetize traffic. Furthermore, welcome.js silently loads a tracking pixel/iframe from 'eurekaa.app'. The use of Gemini branding is a lure to get users to install a tool that monitors browsing and hijacks search intent.
key_concerns: Unsolicited injection of UI elements on all websites (*://*/*).
Redirection of user search queries to a third-party search aggregator (srch.ing).
Dual-purpose behavior where search hijacking is not disclosed in the description.

exfiltration_chain.processing_method: Captured via an injected overlay search bar on every page.
exfiltration_chain.code_evidence: In iframe.js: function googlevisit() { var valo = "https://srch.ing/?q=" + encodeURIComponent(lastvalue); ... chrome.runtime.sendMessage({ type: 'bing_in_nt', u_r_l: valo }, ...); }

dual_purpose.hidden_functionality: Search hijacking and UI injection on every website visited.
dual_purpose.code_evidence: In all.js: if(document.getElementById("eurekaa_chatgpt_bard_sidebar") === null ...) { ... moveahead(img); } which injects a floating icon onto every page (matches: ["*://*/*"]). This triggers a search overlay that redirects user searches to srch.ing.

pattern_assessment.justification: This domain is a known search redirector. The extension injects a custom search bar into every page and redirects the user's queries to this domain, which is a hallmark of search-hijacking malware.
Used to dynamically build and inject the 'Eurekaa' search overlay into the host page's DOM, bypassing standard extension UI boundaries like the side panel or popup.
While potentially a keylogger, in this context it is used for navigation and 'Enter' key detection within the extension's own search/prompt bar UI.
